solution_line_template: Each portion of the distance they covered is {hallway_length}/({father_speed_ratio}+{son_speed_ratio}) = <<{hallway_length}/({father_speed_ratio}+{son_speed_ratio})={distance_portion}>>{distance_portion}m

The father covered three portions of the distance which is {father_speed_ratio}*{distance_portion}m = <<{father_speed_ratio}*{distance_portion}={father_distance_from_end}>>{father_distance_from_end}m from his end
